home.heroTitle: Landscape hero pages for indie founders.
home.heroBody: I'm Ari, a designer-developer building wide-screen hero pages, lightweight blogs, and reliable contact flows. Every sprint pairs Vite.js on the front, Express on the back, and color-led storytelling throughout.
home.highlightsBody: Color-coded hero layouts with motion-first storytelling and calm publishing stacks.

highlights.title: Wide-screen layouts
highlights.body: Edge-to-edge compositions, layered gradients, and scroll-triggered typography tuned for every breakpoint.

highlights.title: Vite + Express core
highlights.body: Vite.js handles motion and states while Express relays contact forms, files, and smart replies.

highlights.title: Simple MDX blog
highlights.body: Portable MDX content rendered with VitePress so notes stay versioned and easy to extend.
